name: IMTEK | NoOdor.com
tag_list: smell, odor, deodorizer, odour, stink, odor-eliminator, odor-remover
overview:
IMTEK is the international leader in supplying superior reusable, environmentally-friendly, safe, recyclable, non-toxic, non-flammable, and non-caustic smell elimination products that work. Our natural deodorizers don’t contain any VOCs, CFCs, heavy metals, harmful or ozone depleting chemicals. They provide unique advantages that benefit people, pets and the planet while removing the stench at a low cost.

Our products kill odor and the pollutants which cause them without covering-up with harsh perfumes. Foul odors just don’t stand a chance! They are regenerated by simply heating in a microwave or placing in sunlight and reused for years making them very cost effective. They don’t contain or emit chemicals and are beneficial for people experiencing problems from allergies and chemical sensitivity.

Since our energy smart odor control products work without power and can be rejuvenated using solar energy, they will help reduce your energy dependency along with carbon footprint and help global warming while neutralizing smells.
